attributes.action: As they failed to deliver Brexit all MPs must be banned standing for re-election
attributes.background: In 2016 the UK voted to leave the EU and sent a clear instruction to our elected representatives. To date they have failed to deliver the will of the people and continue to follow personal and party policy. Therefore we should reboot parliament with new representation.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole's responsibility to ban individuals from standing for Parliament on the basis of their political decisions.

If you would like to see a change in electoral rules so that sitting MPs cannot stand again for re-election and new MPs are subject to a term limit, you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/249457
